DOC.criteria: Fasting LDLC screen ≥ 100 mg/dL ≤ 190 mg/dL Fasting triglycerides ≤ 150 mg/dL Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 32.0 kg/m^2 Framingham cardiac risk score 10 % le Treatment lipidregulating drug counter supplement last 3 month prior screen History coronary heart disease ( CHD ) CHD equivalent Uncontrolled hypertension Diabetes mellitus
